channel.title: How i make this?
channel.description:
[font=cursive]My Questions :[/font]

[b]Thank for help[/b] [font=cursive]~Sara~[/font] [b]PS:I called Desert Pkz Owner becose i want be called liek it.So don't push me...[/b][br][size=1]Posted on: June 22, 2007, 06:54:06 AM[/size][hr]erm does anyone know how to do it???

item.title: How i make this?
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

The Green Question : Dunno.

The Red Question : Add a Teleport Thing in Boolean process. Like this :

if(absX == XXX && absY == YYYY)
{
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = YYYY;
sendMessage("Your Bloody English.");
addItem(ItemID, Amount);
}

Its something Like that. I Hope i helped

Read full topic
